messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the total points calculation for each skill?
The total points for each skill are the points allocated plus the base chance.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can you find the half and fifth values for each skill?
A Quick Reference Chart for half and fifth values can be found on page 49.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the half and fifth values on the sheet?
to write in the half and fifth values for each skill, allowing you to reference them quickly in the middle of a game
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can a Quick Reference Chart for half and fifth values be found?
on page 49
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should investigators do before writing in the half and fifth values?
Allocate occupation skill points and then personal interest skill points.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can investigators find the half and fifth values for each skill?
On the investigator sheet, which also has space to write in the half and fifth values.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill allows an investigator to use weapons?
Fighting and Firearms skills
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can a Quick Reference Chart for half and fifth values be found?
On page 49
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are some ways an investigator can use weapons?
Fighting and Firearms skills, and their various specializations
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should a player do when an occupation includes the skill of Fighting or Firearms, but no specialization is specified?
Choose one or more specializations of that skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main focus of building an investigator?
building up a story of who you want to play in the game
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What factors contribute to establishing a fully rounded investigator?
characteristics, occupation, sex, and age
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skills should an investigator have to be effective?
Skills like Fighting, Climb, and Throw, or Library Use, Spot Hidden, and Psychology.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should the Keeper consider when creating a group of investigators?
The occupations and skill sets of the other players and the style of game and scenario they will be playing.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of occupations do the Keeper and other players discuss for the investigators in a game?
The Keeper and other players discuss certain occupations in mind for the investigators to play.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is important for the investigators in a game?
How you decide to ‘play’ your character that is really important
